jedupdate.core_body:
Managing your image gallery has never been so simple!
### Features ✓ Display all images stored in a directory ✓ Read IPTC and EXIF data to create title and descriptions ✓ Automatic thumbnails creation ✓ Sorting by Date using Exif data, ✓ 48 settings ✓ Categories to include/exclude ✓ Set default image ✓ Thumbnail size, style
*★ premium version only* ✓ Display mindmap in module ✓ Support
### Image Gallery * Display thumbnails with title and description. * Galleries are displayed with smooth animation. * Support pagination. * Images are displayed in full view via a modal popup window. * Easy and highly customizable.
### Local, Flickr, Picasa, Google+, SmugMug * All photo in a directory get published and added to your website. * Support Flickr, Picasa, Google+, SmugMug sharing site. * You do not need to upload images manually to your site. * Display photos on your website with your custom design. * Automatic thumbnail generation. * Bandwidth saving and fast photo downloading.
### Hover Effects * Spice up your Portfolio with eye-catching hover effects. * Effects can be combined for more possibilities. 2D/3D effects available. * Build your own effects. * Touchscreen friendly.
### Multi-Level Navigation * Organize your images in albums. * Breadcrumb to navigate in photo albums. * Unlimited number of sub-levels.
### Mobile Friendly * Touchscreen enabled and responsive. * Galleries and photos are automatically resized. * Download small images on small display (with Flickr, Picasa, Google+ and SmugMug storage).
